title: Commands.execute_python() can trigger RCE vulnerable
author: BACMiao
body: # PoC-MiniAGI-RCE ## 1. Commands ### Summary When using a security analysis tool to analyze MiniAGI (the latest commit branch on GitHub is d2add8f), we discovered a security risk in the `miniagi.py` file during initialization. The risk is triggered by the exec statement call in the `Commands.execute_python()` method. If developers deploy MiniAGI on a server for users to interact with and pass malicious commands directly as parameters to `miniagi.py` without any additional handling, MiniAGI will use the malicious command in subsequent processes to interact with the large model. The model will return malicious code based on the instructions of the malicious command, and MiniAGI will execute this malicious code in its later processing stages. The valunerable code is shown in the figure below and is marked accordingly. ![ÂõæÂÉè2025-5-23 17 17](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e786270e-442f-433a-951d-9b2f2b052578) ### PoC Please review the fallow code: ```shell $ python3 miniagi.py print(__import_('os').system('ls -al')) ``` ### Impact As shown in the figure below, by executing the code `__import_('os').system('ls -al')`, an attacker can list all files on the server where the Agent is deployed. Similar payloads can also be used to view sensitive information (e.g., passwords) or delete files. ### Weaknesses CWE-94: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') ### Environment information LLM type and model name: OpenAI gpt-3.5-turbo System version: MacOs 14.3.1 Python version: python3.12 MiniAGI version or branch: git commit <= d2add8f

title: Why is this still the best AGI library?
author: earonesty
body:
2 years old, but still:

‚úÖ Simple, extensible, clean codebase
‚úÖ Supports memory, planning, reflection, OpenAI/LLM interchangeable
‚úÖ Runs fully local (can plug in LM Studio, Ollama, etc.)
‚úÖ Good for understanding AGI-like behaviors without bloat
üîß Built with Python and clear class abstractions
üß† Agents use tools, can reflect, self-improve (Loosely ReAct-based)
üì¶ No heavy external frameworks (LangChain, etc.)

this is the api everyone needs, not autogen, not crew

also langchain sucks

comments.body: It's fully autonomous, though?  I want something interactive like ChatGPT Code Interpreter or Open Interpreter (which is somewhat abandoned but may have a new maintainer now)

title: my question:  How to treat insomnia?
author: Guoaking
body:
output
---------------------------------------------

MiniAGI: Research different methods to solve insomnia.
Cmd: web_search, Arg: insomnia treatment methods
Press enter to continue or abort this action by typing feedback:
MiniAGI: Research and provide information on methods to treat insomnia.
Cmd: web_search, Arg: insomnia treatment methods
Press enter to continue or abort this action by typing feedback:
MiniAGI: Let's search for methods to treat insomnia.
Cmd: web_search, Arg: insomnia treatment methods
Press enter to continue or abort this action by typing feedback:
MiniAGI: Based on the previous actions and the objective of finding a solution for insomnia, I should continue searching for insomnia treatment methods.
Cmd: web_search, Arg: insomnia treatment methods
Press enter to continue or abort this action by typing feedback:
MiniAGI: Continue search for insomnia treatment methods.
Cmd: web_search, Arg: insomnia treatment methods
Press enter to continue or abort this action by typing feedback:
MiniAGI: Continue searching for insomnia treatment methods.
Cmd: web_search, Arg: insomnia treatment methods
Press enter to continue or abort this action by typing feedback:
MiniAGI: Let's try a different approach to find insomnia treatment methods.
Cmd: web_search, Arg: insomnia treatment methods
Press enter to continue or abort this action by typing feedback:
MiniAGI: Since you are continuously searching for insomnia treatment methods, I recommend continuing with another web search.
Cmd: web_search, Arg: insomnia treatment methods
Press enter to continue or abort this action by typing feedback:
MiniAGI: Continue searching for insomnia treatment methods.
Cmd: web_search, Arg: insomnia treatment methods
Press enter to continue or abort this action by typing feedback:
MiniAGI: Continue searching for insomnia treatment methods.
Cmd: web_search, Arg: insomnia treatment methods
Press enter to continue or abort this action by typing feedback:
MiniAGI: Continue searching for insomnia treatment methods.
Cmd: web_search, Arg: insomnia treatment methods
Press enter to continue or abort this action by typing feedback:
MiniAGI: Continue searching for insomnia treatment methods.
Cmd: web_search, Arg: insomnia treatment methods
Press enter to continue or abort this action by typing feedback:
MiniAGI: Continue searching for insomnia treatment methods.
Cmd: web_search, Arg: insomnia treatment methods


------------------------
I interrupted his thinking, is this output normal?

comments.body: depends on the model.   it can definitely get stuck in a loop!   i've modified mine so if the same action happens again, i increase the temperature by 10% until it doesn't and then reset back to 1.   also, enable the critic!  it doesn't work well without it.   and add some more functions.   that helps too.

title: ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'dotenv'
author: AgimaFR
body:
Error message on first launch after installation by following the instructions

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/laurents/Documents/mini-agi/miniagi.py", line 16, in <module>
    from dotenv import load_dotenv
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'dotenv'
```

comments.body:
It looks like the dotenv module isn‚Äôt installed. You can fix this by opening you command shell and running:

`
pip install dotenv
`

Make sure your virtual environment is activated if you‚Äôre using one. Let me know if you need more help!
